dmca.title: Tracing a warez forum to the planet servers
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: Cliff Harris [mailto:cliff@positech.co.uk] 
Sent: Friday, April 06, 2007 4:09 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: Re: Tracing a warez forum to the planet servers
Importance: High

Please explain if this servers content has been examined, and if you are
in 
agreement that it is in breach of your terms of service, the website is 
still running, and still distributing illegal copyrighted software, and
is 
now doing so with your knowledge.

Cliff Harris
Positech Games
www.positech.co.uk
----- Original Message ----- 
From: "Copyright" <copyright@theplanet.com>
To: "Cliff Harris" <cliff@positech.co.uk>
Sent: Wednesday, April 04, 2007 3:55 PM
Subject: RE: Tracing a warez forum to the planet servers


Please note that the IP address 70.85.189.18 is within our network as of
9:55:25 a.m. (GMT-6) on April 4, 2007.

Legal Response Team

-----Original Message-----
From: Cliff Harris [mailto:cliff@positech.co.uk]
Sent: Wednesday, April 04, 2007 2:46 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: Tracing a warez forum to the planet servers

Hi, could you please confirm that this IP address:

                    70.85.189.18

Is one of yours?
It hosts the following site:
www.ozcanhome.com, a forum for trading copyrighted applications, movies,

games and other content, including copyrighted PC games for which my
company
is the IP holder.
They are clearly in breach of any TOS, could you confirm this is an
account
with your company, and let me know if any more information is required?
(2
seconds looking at the site will tell you all you need to know).

Cliff Harris
Positech Games
www.positech.co.uk
